info.name: Pioneer DDJ-REV1
info.author: alexandr, Warker, nschloe, dj3730, jusko, tiesjan, mjlyon, 0b1, AKOI
info.description: Midi Mapping for the Pioneer DDJ-REV1

option.label: :hwbtn:`VINYL` enables slip mode
option.description: If enabled, :hwbtn:`VINYL`button toggles slip mode instead of CDJ mode.

option.label: Show Sampler Skin
option.description: If enabled, the sampler skin is shown while adjusting sampler volume.

option.label: Waveform Zoom
option.description: If enabled, vinyl pitch bend controls waveform zoom. CDJ mode remains unchanged.

option.label: First Pad
option.description: The top left or pad button.

option.label: Second Pad
option.description: The top left second pad button.

option.label: Third Pad
option.description: The top right second pad button.

option.label: Sixth Pad
option.description: The bottom left second pad button.

option.label: Seventh Pad
option.description: The bottom right second pad button.
